The new arival of the three gracis, into Anglia Lamenting the abusis of this present age. Batman, Stephen, d. 1584.
[48] p. : ill.
By Thomas East, for VVilliam Norton, and Stephen Bateman, [Imprinted at London : [1580?]]
Dedication signed: Steuen Batman. Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC. Running title reads: The late ariuall, of the three gracis. Signatures: A-F⁴. Imperfect; bottom margin cropped, affecting signatures. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
